Not logged in.

1) You can proceed with the app by simply providing a (currently unauthenticated) username below and setting online mode to "false" on the general preferences - but your routes will be saved locally and will only by synced to the server after you successfully log in.

2) Provide a valid username and password and login

3) Create a new user
